definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately

sentences.english: Sepals oblong or linear, erect or spreading, base of lateral pair saccate .
sentences.chinese: 萼片长圆形或线形，直立或开展，基于侧配对。

sentences.english: Our closest relatives straightened their backs and began walking upright on two legs.
sentences.chinese: 人类的祖先伸直了后肢开始直立行走。
那马因受惊而后腿直立。

sentences.english: Bottle upright, away from the light, in a cool ventilated place.
sentences.chinese: 直立储藏于避光阴凉通风处。

sentences.english: Slip into a chair or remain upright, and sway back and forth.
sentences.chinese: 滑进一张椅子中，或者保持直立，来回的摇晃。

sentences.english: The comb-type caisson is a new structural type of breakwaters.
sentences.chinese: 梳式防波堤是一种新型直立防波堤，国内外属首创。

sentences.english: The upright orientation is also the first step in surface detachment for bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 这种直立的方位也是细菌脱离组织表面的第一步。

sentences.english: Be sure the cut is straight so the tree will stand up properly.
sentences.chinese: 要确保截面是水平的，这样树才能完全直立起来。

sentences.english: Dual cup holders are extra-deep and angled to keep drinks upright.
sentences.chinese: 双层杯托是加深的，转变角度保持饮品直立。

sentences.english: Our brains are roughly 25 percent larger than those of the late Homo erectus.
sentences.chinese: 我们的大脑体积比晚期直立人大约大25%。

sentences.english: Use from birth until baby is able to sit upright unassisted .
sentences.chinese: 从出生婴儿的使用，直到能够坐在直立无辅助。

sentences.english: Installed with castor wheel & vertical designed , small occupationeasy to RE-move;
sentences.chinese: 四轮直立式设计，体积小，移动方便。

sentences.english: Homo erectus was also physically similar to modern humans with large brains and bodies.
sentences.chinese: 直立人具有大的脑髓，身体特征也与现代人相似。

sentences.english: Supporting platform for scale mounted on the machine with vertical ladder.
sentences.chinese: 对于用直立梯固定在机器上的台秤的支撑平台。

sentences.english: The horse suddenly reared up and threw me off.
sentences.chinese: 忽然用后腿直立起来，把我摔下马背。

sentences.english: And modernism is all about verticality,from a certain angle.
sentences.chinese: 现代主义是从固定角度来看是直立的。

definition: to bend/to curve around/curved/crooked/to wind/to warp
to hunch over/to stoop/to arch one's back (upward)
vertical/to erect/to set upright/vertical stroke in Chinese characters/young servant (old)
to land/to touch the ground/also pr. [zhuo2 di4]
